name: Hesperides Nymphs “Hespereia”
description:
“Hespereia” is THE HESPERIDES were the goddess-nymphs of the evening and the golden light of sunsets. The Hesperides were entrusted with the care of wild animals and the tree of the golden apples. The seven nymphs and their glowing, golden apples were regarded as the source of the golden light of sunset
“Hespereia” is commonly seen with the pink peacock and the animals she considers sacred. Portrayed as majestic and solemn.

Race : Hesperides Nymphs
Genealogy : 7th Sister
Guardian Animal : Pink Peacock 
Rarity : Rare

Style: fantasy , fairy tale
Genre: mixed media art
Media: watercolor
